info.name: Flickr WideScreen - (GM) - Quit Multiple Groups
info.description: That's a companion for my Userstyles: ► Flickr WideScreen - ALLinONE - Old Design It Help to easily use this greasemonkey Script: Flickr Quit Multiple Groups, By Alesa Dam. "Allows to quit mutliple groups in one action, from your Groups page" As of April 22 2015 [after Flickr's radical change), it was broken , but i provide a working tweak here: GM - Flickr Quit Multiple Groups - by ALESADAM - DECEMBRE tweak [PastBin]
info.additionalInfo: ▶ What this userstyles does ?: - "Quit Selected Groups" button stay Fixed on the middle of the left side: so you don't need, at each time you want quit a pool, to go to the top of the to press it and you can watch directly if the action is done. - Large Checkbox : useful if you have like me 4000 pools to remove, no ?...) - Big Green "DONE" indicator when the Quit function is .... done :-) ▶ Here the post about why i need to delete my subscribed pool to regain access to the invitation function on the Photo Page : [BUG] - I can't invite a shot to my pool :"You're not an admin of any groups!
